name: date
description: Filter changesets whose date is greater or less than the date.

name: reasons
description: Filter changesets that have one or more of the Suspicious Reasons. Inform the Suspicion Reasons ids separated by commas.

name: geometry
description: Geospatial filter of changeset whose bbox intersects with another geometry. You can use any geometry type in this filter.

name: comment
description: Filter changesets by its comment field using the icontains lookup expression.

name: source
description: Filter changesets by its source field using the icontains lookup expression.

name: checked
description: Filter changesets that were checked or not. Use true/false, 1/0 values.

name: editor
description: Filter changesets by its editor field using the icontains lookup expression.

name: check_date
description: Filter changesets whose check_date is greater or less than the dates.

name: create
description: Filter changesets whose number of elements created are greater or less than equal to number.

name: modify
description: Filter changesets whose number of elements modified are greater or less than equal to number.

name: delete
description: Filter changesets whose number of elements deleted are greater or less than equal to number.

name: imagery_used
description: Filter changesets by its imagery_used field using the icontains lookup expression.

name: checked_by
description: Filter changesets that were checked by a user. Use commas to search for more than one user.

name: users
description: Filter changesets created by a user. Use commas to search for more than one user.

name: ids
description: Filter changesets by its ID. Use commas to search for more than one id.

name: tags
description: Filter changesets that have one or more of the Tags. Inform the Tags ids separated by commas.

name: harmful
description: Filter changesets that were marked as harmful or not. Use true/false, 1/0 values.

name: order_by
description: Order the Changesets by one of the following fields: id, date, check_date, create, modify or delete. Use a minus sign (-) before the field name to reverse the ordering. Default ordering is '-id'.

name: is_suspect
description: Filter changesets that were considered suspect by OSMCHA.

name: powerfull_editor
description: Filter changesets that were created using a software editor considered powerfull (those that allow to create, modify or delete data in a batch).

name: hide_whitelist
description: If True, it will exclude the changesets created by the users that you whitelisted

name: area_lt
description: Filter changesets that have a bbox area lower than X times the area of your geospatial filter. For example, if the bbox or geometry you defined in your filter has an area of 1 degree and you set 'area_lt=2', it will filter the changesets whose bbox area is lower than 2 degree
